data.Sentence: Pulmonary mild infiltration in left lingular segment, RML and bil. lower lobes.
Mildly lobulated contour of liver compatible with liver parenchymal disease.
A 9.2 cm early enhancement and early wash out lesion in S4-8-7 liver with compression of RHV and MHV and occlusion of S4 PV branches.
Structure: Liver mass invasion < Invasion Vascular invasion < Right hepatic vein
Liver mass invasion < Invasion Vascular invasion < Middle hepatic vein
Liver lesion < Single lesion enhancement < Early enhancement, early washout favoring HCC Localization < S4 Size[mm]
Liver vessel < Portal vein < Unremarkable < Main portal vein and branches

data.Sentence: No definite enlargement of retroperitoneal LNs.
No abnormal fluid collection in the abdomen.
Enlarged prostate glands with internal small calcifcation.
